title: Contract
description: When you instantiate an instance of Contract you need to specify the names of the functions you have on your smart contract. Then the new instance of Contract will have methods with the same names as your smart contract functions. When you instantiate an instance of Contract you need to specify the names of the functions you have on your smart contract. Then the new instance of Contract will have methods with the same names as your smart contract functions.
